title: I am a registered domestic partner in CA & need financial advice.
question: I am a same sex domestic partner in CA. I am going to be unemployed (with no unemployment benefits) and will be unable to pay my personal credit card debt. Will my partner be held responsible for my personal debt? I might need to eventually file personal bankruptcy. We do own a home together (1st & 2nd mortgage). Am I able to file bankruptcy without affecting her credit? Am I even able to file bankruptcy under the circumstances?
answers:
Your partner will not be personally responsible for your debt ... but her income, since it is now community income, may possibly be garnished to pay your debt (although this is unlikely).
Your BK should not affect her credit, since her SS# will not be involved.
